I recently purchased a brown long-sleeve shirt, and I couldn’t be more pleased with it! The material is soft, breathable, and feels incredibly comfortable against the skin. It’s lightweight yet provides enough warmth for cooler weather, making it perfect for layering or wearing on its own.  The fit is spot-on—not too tight and not too loose—and the stitching is high-quality, so it holds its shape even after multiple washes. The rich brown color is versatile and pairs well with almost anything, from jeans to dressier pants.  What I love most is how stylish yet simple it looks. It’s ideal for casual outings, work settings, or even a night out. This shirt has quickly become a staple in my wardrobe, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable and fashionable piece of clothing!

I chose an XL, due to a 39 inch bust. But if I wanted a semi tight fit, then the Large would be the size I'd want & it would still be appropriate..this top is very flattering, IMHO. Plus, the buttons do take this style up a notch & I like that it comes down longer than the usual similar tops. Not too long. Actually, I think that's what helps makes this nice looking on me. And the feel is soft & comfy, I wanted to keep it on for as long as I could. Of course, with white, I personally always need something underneath. Yet I can layer this with anything! It works on so many levels when it comes to my wardrobe that I am really, really pleased! I want one in every color!! Love it 😀

These shirts are great to wear under jackets. I even wear them under my ski clothes. You need to read the density of these! Some are on the thinner size that are comfortable and not bulky. Then you have the heavier ones that keep you warmer but they are more comfortable to wear in a restaurant or go shopping in. The colors are exactly as they look..they are warm and a great value for the money..there is no smell of this material!
